item.description:
We started going to BOKX109 at the Indigo Hotel in September and those that have attended so far have really liked it. They even have a small jazz band that plays after 7:00 PM.

BOKX109 American Prime was named one of the eight greatest restaurants in hotels that the Phantom Gourmet has ever found in New England. It’s rated “Best Steakhouse” by Yankee Magazine in it’s Best of New England list.

Coveniently located just off route 95/128 and accessable via the "T".

Very modern decour. Large bar, plus clusters of comfortable chairs and sofas.

Munchies and/or dinner available.

Directions:

By "T", take the Green Line to Riverside, then walk over to the hotel.

By car, take route 95/128 to Exit 22 Grove Street/MBTA .
item.name: BOKX109 at the Indigo Hotel
